transcription.text: This prototype was built using a combination of stereolithography (SLA) and full colour 3D printed parts, which were made from a powdered material solidified by an inkjet printing process over hundreds of layers. It was used by the Blackmagic Industrial Design team during the early stages of design process to evaluate the camera's design and functionality.

work.title: URSA Mini Pro 4.6K G2 Form Prototype
